name: Run Render E2E tests
prompt:
Check if the latest Render deploy for https://cricket-academy-app.onrender.com is healthy, and if it is, run Playwright E2E against it with:
BASE_URL=https://cricket-academy-app.onrender.com
ADMIN_EMAIL=admin@test.com
ADMIN_PASSWORD=password
Command: npx playwright test --reporter=list
Summarize failures.
